metadata.title: CVE-2024-46784 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: mana: Fix error handling in mana_create_txq/rxq's NAPI cleanupCurrently napi_disable() gets called during rxq and txq cleanup,even before napi is enabled and hrtimer is initialized. It causeskernel panic.? page_fault_oops+0x136/0x2b0  ? page_counter_cancel+0x2e/0x80  ? do_user_addr_fault+0x2f2/0x640  ? refill_obj_stock+0xc4/0x110  ? exc_page_fault+0x71/0x160  ? asm_exc_page_fault+0x27/0x30  ? __mmdrop+0x10/0x180  ? __mmdrop+0xec/0x180  ? hrtimer_active+0xd/0x50  hrtimer_try_to_cancel+0x2c/0xf0  hrtimer_cancel+0x15/0x30  napi_disable+0x65/0x90  mana_destroy_rxq+0x4c/0x2f0  mana_create_rxq.isra.0+0x56c/0x6d0  ? mana_uncfg_vport+0x50/0x50  mana_alloc_queues+0x21b/0x320  ? skb_dequeue+0x5f/0x80

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-50.51').
